name: Space Duty (itch)
description:
A short and comical sci-fi story that takes place aboard a small space station in a somewhat strange universe. You have been drafted and shipped to a system on the fringe of colonized space, to make things worse, you have had an AI chip implanted into your head and your memory has failed. Your only desire and purpose is to get off the station.

Game features NPCs that take care of their needs, station feels alive and there are subtle different choices that you can make through your journey.
